rows.label: tlk400703_msg0002
rows.name: You'll want to talk to Yuu first.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0003
rows.name:
He's got quite a bit of stuff to tell you,
so prepare for a long chat.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0004
rows.name: Made it through Yuu's lecture, did you?

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0005
rows.name:
First you want to be accepting
a Merc Mission.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0006
rows.name:
Looks like you've accepted the
mission Yuu set up for you.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, all you can do now is wait. That's
what it means to be a leader - you trust
in your men to get the job done.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0008
rows.name:
Well hey, looks like the squad you
sent out is back already.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0009
rows.name: You should check out their report.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0010
rows.name:
That way, you get your reward
and the mission's truly over.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0011
rows.name:
How was your first mission?
Pretty easy, I'll bet.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0012
rows.name:
Go ahead and report back in to Yuu.
He was worrying his ass off about
whether you'd get the hang of things.
